scenario_text.value: *huff* *huff* It was all just a dream...

Hee hee, if that’s how you feel, why not join
our hunt for sacrifices?

Were you watching me sleep?
That’s pretty creepy.

How many times do I have to tell you?
I’m not going to work with you.

I don’t care about humans.
It’s not those kids I have a grudge against.

But I can’t just stand here and let those
jerks do whatever they want!

They’re using the humans’ power to evolve.
I’ll beat them and destroy all their bonds!
